title: Build core NFL Combine Tracker with payment toggle and basic tracking

requirements.text: Create admin panel page that displays all users in a table with their current payment status (paid/unpaid) and provides toggle switches to change each user's payment status between paid and unpaid

quotes: the admin panel toggles users from "unpaid" to "paid" and possibly back to "unpaid" or "paid" based on disciplinary action

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel displays all registered users
Each user row shows current payment status
Toggle switch allows admin to change status between paid and unpaid
Status changes persist in backend

requirements.text: Implement authentication gate that blocks unpaid users from logging in and displays error message: 'must pay in full to receive each month (31 days) sign in ability and access to the app. Each payment of $1.00 via Zelle earns a user one more month or 31 more days "paid" sign in ability and full access to the app and its features'

quotes: "unpaid" users unable to physically even sign in who also receive an error message if they try to login with "unpaid" toggled on

acceptanceCriteria: Unpaid users cannot proceed past login screen
Error message displays exact payment instructions
Paid users can access app normally
Payment status check happens on login attempt

requirements.text: Add landing page message displaying payment instructions: 'please add all contact card info or contact card itself in your description of the Zelle payment(s) you send to the following individual (Matt Rossin) at Zelle phone number 3527348440'

quotes: On the cover it should have a message stating "please add all contact card info..."

acceptanceCriteria: Payment instructions appear prominently on landing/cover page
Zelle phone number 3527348440 is displayed
Instructions mention Matt Rossin as recipient
Message requests contact card info in payment description

requirements.text: Add contact information message to landing page: 'If you have any issues contact the admin Matt @thenewbruce1 on Instagram or via Txt or FaceTime at the ðŸ“² iPhone number 3527348440. My email is thenewbruce1@gmail.com or mattarmor1111@gmail.com but is rarely checked.'

quotes: Another message should read "If you have any issues contact the admin Matt @thenewbruce1 on Instagram..."

acceptanceCriteria: Contact information displays on landing page
Instagram handle @thenewbruce1 is shown
Phone number 3527348440 is displayed
Both email addresses are listed with note about rare checking

requirements.text: Store and display admin principal ID (i67ts-e55ut-cg7iv-w4qa6-f63qo-pgevo-7zqec-cevgk-5nm7d-xjryz-mae) in backend for access control and admin identification
acceptanceCriteria: Admin principal ID is stored in backend
Admin status is verified using this principal
Only this principal can access admin panel
Admin privileges include payment status toggling

requirements.text: Create Contact Card page where users can enter and display their real name, NFL Combine Tracker username (display name), and any contact information they wish to share

quotes: 1) "Contact Card" Page - where absolutely any and all contact info including real name and "NFL Combine Tracker" (the username or name a particular user would like to be called by on the app)

acceptanceCriteria: Page allows users to input real name
Users can set NFL Combine Tracker username/display name
Form accepts optional contact information fields
Contact card data is saved to user profile

requirements.text: Create New Entry page allowing users to input NFL Combine statistics for all standard combine drills with notes field for additional context

quotes: 2)"New Entry Page" where up to date NFL Combine Statistics can be loaded up
A "notes" can also be added on the athlete or "user" with each "New  Entry

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes input fields for all NFL Combine drill results
Notes field allows users to add context to their entries
Entries are saved with timestamp
Users can view their submitted entries

requirements.text: Implement basic LeaderBoard page that displays all users ranked by their combine performance with ranking from #1 to lowest, showing key performance metrics for each user

quotes: 3)"The LeaderBoard" - publicly displays the ranks of all users from #1 to the lowest possible number

acceptanceCriteria: LeaderBoard displays all users with combine entries
Users are ranked from #1 down based on performance
Each entry shows username and key stats
Rankings are visible to all paid users

constraints: Use existing CombineEntry and user profile data structures from backend/main.mo
Maintain existing Internet Identity authentication system
Keep payment status toggle functionality restricted to admin principal only
Do not modify existing combine entry form and validation logic
Preserve existing published/leaderboard functionality while adding payment gates
nonGoals: Instagram, YouTube, or social media integrations (future phase)
Photo and video upload functionality (future phase)
Social sharing to external platforms (future phase)
AI-powered automatic ranking system (start with simple metric-based ranking)
Zelle payment API integration (manual payment verification only)
Automatic payment expiration after 31 days (manual admin control only)
